activities: ICON Clinical Research Inc., its subsidiaries and affiliates provide a broad range of outsourcing services to the pharmaceutical, biotechnology and medical device industries on a global basis. During the conduct of its operations, ICON may collect and process data relating to study participants, clinical research investigators and their staff, medical and healthcare professionals, customers, vendors, contractors, consultants, in addition to human resources data. Due to the global nature of its business, ICON may transfer personal data between members of the European Union and the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, customer, clinical trial data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
